name: Astronaught
description:
Explore the quiet and mysterious moon and discover it's dark caves beneath the surface.

Update: 

- Fixed a bug (hopefully) that caused performance issues when running out of oxygen

- Added text at the start of the caves which clarifies that you can jump higher by jumping while running up slopes

How to Play

WASD/Arrow Keys = Movement

W/Space/Up Arrow = Jump

Esc/P = Pause

Be sure to report any bugs you find.
